name: Responsive Video for WordPress
author: @nosecreek

sections.description:
This plugin takes advantage of WordPress’ built in oEmbed functionality to make it easy to insert responsive videos into your site or blog. Just copy the URL of the video you want to embed and paste it into the WordPress editor. This plugin will maintain the default aspect ratio of the video at any page size.

This plugin has been tested as working with the following video sites:

  • YouTube

  • Vimeo

  • blip.tv

  • Flickr (videos)

  • DailyMotion

  • Hulu

  • WordPress.tv

  • FunnyOrDie.com (WordPress 3.0+)

  • Revision3

View the source on GitHub.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the responsive-video-for-wordpress folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Your video embeds are now responsive!

short_description: Using a responsive WordPress theme? Make your videos responsive too! Just activate this plugin, and your videos will be instantly responsive!
